definition: A series of related items or products within a company's offerings, typically sharing similar characteristics or design elements. It is commonly used in business and marketing contexts to refer to a range of products that are developed and marketed together, often targeting a specific market segment or consumer need.

examples.german: Die Produktlinie umfasst verschiedene Modelle von Smartphones.
examples.english: The product line includes various models of smartphones.

examples.german: Unsere Produktlinie bietet eine breite Auswahl an Schuhen für jeden Anlass.
examples.english: Our product line offers a wide range of shoes for every occasion.

examples.german: Die neue Produktlinie zeichnet sich durch innovative Technologie aus.
examples.english: The new product line is characterized by innovative technology.

examples.german: Die Produktlinie umfasst sowohl Damen- als auch Herrenbekleidung.
examples.english: The product line includes both women's and men's clothing.

examples.german: Unsere Produktlinie wird ständig erweitert, um den Bedürfnissen unserer Kunden gerecht zu werden.
examples.english: Our product line is constantly expanding to meet the needs of our customers.
